Lines.Speaker: Yuu
Lines.Speech: Soooo __do you know where the crystal is Scull?

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech:
S.C.U.L.L.Y _Not Scull.
And no. If I knew where it was, I would have it in my possession already.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: Hahahaha. I see you're already regretting your decision... Agent Scull.

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: Glados knock it off. Look, _up ahead.
[i]Looking ahead, you see the unconcious form of Kt-7, the half human, half robot member of the squadron your lieutenant was running... was.
[i]Luminescent spores from nearby fungi littering the floor funnel into Kt-7's mouth as each breath vacuums them up.

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: She'd be stone cold dead if she weren't half robot. Those spores register on my HUD as extremely poisonous. Glados, you had the advanced filter module installed right?

Lines.Speaker: Yuu
Lines.Speech: You talking to your AI Scull? Glados huh? Nice name! __Hiiiiiiii Glados.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: Absolutely insufferable. Please dispose of her, Boss.

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: No. Did you have that module installed or not.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: I've already begun initialisation of the advanced filter module, Boss. We need to save Kt-7 as soon as possible, she might only have minutes left!

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: You seem in an awful hurry to save her. Not at all like that when we found Yuu.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: Well duuuh. Kt-7 is half robot... have to look out for my own kind.

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: Apparently not humans though... definitely need to move that personality service appointment up sooner.
